title: Funds for wall repair project debated by Weirton Finance Committee - The Daily Times
content: Funds for wall repair project debated by Weirton Finance Committee  The Daily Times
description: WEIRTON — Despite some concerns expressed during their meeting Wednesday, members of the city’s Finance Committee are recommending a budget revision which would complete payment on work performed as part of a recent repair project at the Millsop Community Center. Following the 2-1 recommendation, the full Weirton Council will discuss at its meeting Monday whether […]
